paper_abstract: We determine that the connectivity and the edge-connectivity of the Cartesian product G(1) x G(2) of two strongly connected and finite digraphs G(1) and G(2) are equal to min(n(1)kappa(2), n(2)kappa(1), delta(+)(1) + delta(+)(2), delta(-)(1) + delta(-)(2)) and min{n(1)lambda(2), n(2)lambda(1), delta(+)(1) + delta(+)(2), delta(-)(1) + delta(-)(2)} respectively, where n(i), kappa(j), lambda(i), delta(+)(j), delta(-)(j) are the order, the connectivity, the edge-connectivit, the minimum out-degree and the minimum in-degree of G(i), respectively, for i = 1, 2. (C) 2008 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. NETWORKS, Vol. 52(4),202-205 2008
paper_title: Reliability of Interconnection Networks Modeled by Cartesian Product Digraphs
